# Day 12 - Advent of Code

You can find the link for day 12, 2022 [here](https://adventofcode.com/2022/day/12). This folder will provide complete solutions for part 1 and part 2 of day 12.

NOTE: This code was used from Reddit User [red_shifter](https://topaz.github.io/paste/#). (I struggled on this one and needed help...)

## Setup

To run this code, you should get the input from [this link](https://adventofcode.com/2022/day/12/input) and paste it into `elevations.txt` but my input is already provided as a sample. You should also make sure to have Python installed (I use Python 3.10.12 but it should work with most versions).

# Run The Code

```bash
python3 ./hill-climbing-algorithm.py
```
